name: RecordLinc
overview:
RecordLinc is an Internet based application that is designed to maximize quality of patient care by the sharing of digital records and by improving collaboration between dental professionals.

Our HIPAA compliant products insure patient privacy, increases security of patient records, reduces treatment time and cost, and significantly improves communications. Products

  • RecordLinc Pro - Full dental record backup and collaboration tool
  • RecordLinc Basic - Read only version of tool
  • Smart Refer - Referral card functionality to improve communication
  • Trust Mail - HIPAA compliant email program Email
    info@recordlinc.com Phone
    (415)749-1444 Website http://www.RecordLinc.com
